pl.put.poznan.transformer.tools

Interface JsonToolsDecorator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonTools
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonToolsIgnorer, JsonToolsSelector

    public interface JsonToolsDecorator
extends JsonTools
    Decorator Interface which decorate JsonTools. This interface is responsible for providing modify operation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode modify(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> modified)
      This function modifies actual Object JSON file.It is used to implement specific decorator operation.

      • Methods inherited from interface pl.put.poznan.transformer.tools.JsonTools

        getPrettyJson, parseJson

    • Method Detail

      • modify

        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode modify(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode jsonNode,
                                               java.util.Set<java.lang.String> modified)
        This function modifies actual Object JSON file.It is used to implement specific decorator operation.
        Parameters:
        jsonNode - JSON main node. JSON file in Object format.
        modified - Set of String data. Set of node's names that will be used in processing.
        Returns:
        JSON main node.
